metadata.title: CVE-2018-19653 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul 0.5.1 through 1.4.0 can use cleartext agent-to-agent RPCcommunication because the verify_outgoing setting is improperly documented.NOTE: the vendor has provided reconfiguration steps that do not require asoftware upgrade.

criterions.comment: consul: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
